attributes.action: call on the London Olympic committee to scrap and change the ridiculous logo unveiled for the London 2012 Olympics.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Today the new logo was unveiled for the London 2012 Olympics.

What was wrong with the old one?

The new one shows the UK in a bad light, being too experimental and also reminds far too many of the SS insignia.

Drop this stupid idea of changing from the logo which helped win the UK the Olympics before the UK is made any more of a laughing stock.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
